body: Full volume in english version please..............
@Mhogen thanks for the info, now it all makes sense.
Simple yet so arousing. I hate to see the first girl getting 2nd times. Make me worried some ntr or something:(

To anyone that's asking why this was released or translated rather than the previous chapters...
We already did the previous chapters and uploaded them to mangadex.org (which is still down when I wrote this comment).
I only uploaded 29 to start of at Volume 3. We actually did chapter 28 and the chapters before was did by some other group.
So where are the rest of the chapters translated by the other group you ask? Well, they're also uploaded in mangadex.

Here is the more complete series
https://manycomic.com/comic/bunkou-no-hito-tachi/
What the heck? Why translate and post a random chapter from the 3rd volume of manga before the rest? Well, i supose that's what i get for just browsing "english"
The fuck? how come this gets translated before the vol 1 and 2?
